sentences.en: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution
sentences.cn: 专门解决纠纷的律师

sentences.en: A union would infuse unnecessary conflict into the company'semployee relations.
sentences.cn: 工会会把不必要的冲突带入公司员工关系当中。

sentences.en: A very real danger exists of the conflict becoming internationalised.
sentences.cn: 这一冲突实际上很有可能演变成国际化问题。

sentences.en: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.cn: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.en: efforts to resolve the conflict
sentences.cn: 解决武装冲突的努力

sentences.en: Emotional conflict may shake the foundations of even the strongest relationship.
sentences.cn: 情感冲突可以动摇哪怕是最牢固的人际关系的基础。

sentences.en: He has attempted to find a peaceful solution to the Ossetian conflict.
sentences.cn: 他试图寻求和平解决奥赛梯冲突的方案。

sentences.en: He held firm opinions which usually conflicted with mine.
sentences.cn: 他持有坚定的、通常跟我的相冲突的观点。

sentences.en: He's looking for a way out from this conflict.
sentences.cn: 他正在想办法摆脱这一纷争。

sentences.en: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.cn: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.en: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.cn: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.en: Personal ethics and professional ethics sometimes conflict.
sentences.cn: 个人道德与职业道德之间有时会相冲突。

sentences.en: The conflict with James has dragged on for two years.
sentences.cn: 与詹姆斯的冲突拖了两年。

sentences.en: The ethnic populations are so intermingled that there's bound to be conflict.
sentences.cn: 各民族人口如此杂居，肯定会发生冲突。

sentences.en: the threat of industrial conflict in the coalfields
sentences.cn: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.en: The time has come to put an end to the conflict.
sentences.cn: 结束冲突的时候到了。

sentences.en: There's always a conflict between good and evil in his plays.
sentences.cn: 他的戏剧中总是有善恶之间的斗争。

sentences.en: They are not optimistic about a settlement of the eleven year conflict.
sentences.cn: 他们不是很有信心能和平解决这场长达11年的纷争。

sentences.en: They have agreed to a ceasefire after three years of conflict.
sentences.cn: 经过3年的冲突，他们已经同意停火。

sentences.en: They have been the aggressors in this conflict.
sentences.cn: 他们一直是这次冲突中的挑衅方。

sentences.en: This was a straight conflict of directly opposed aims.
sentences.cn: 这是完全对立的目标之间的正面冲突。

sentences.en: UN troops intervened to avert a threat of violent conflict.
sentences.cn: 联合国部队出面干预，以避免发生暴力冲突的危险。

sentences.en: Unless you respect other people's religions, horrible mistakes and conflict will occur.
sentences.cn: 如果不尊重别人的宗教信仰，就会祷下大错，酿成冲突。

sentences.en: What are the greatest sources of conflict in the Middle East?
sentences.cn: 中东冲突的最重要原因是什么？

words.tran_cn: 冲突的；相矛盾的；不一致的

phrases.tran_cn: 利益冲突；公职人员对公众义务与其本身利益相冲突
法律之间矛盾，法律冲突
纷争地带；冲突地带；战争启示录
目标冲突；目标之间的矛盾

trans.tran_cn: 争执，矛盾心理，冲突，严重分歧
trans.tran_en: a state of disagreement or argument between people, groups, countries etc
if two ideas, beliefs, opinions etc conflict, they cannot exist together or both be true
if two ideas, beliefs, opinions etc conflict, they cannot exist together or both be true
